duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in surgical procedures and therapeutic nursing activities in the procedure suite of the Fertility Center.
Maintain a sterile field and aseptic technique for various medical procedures.
Prepare instruments for cleaning, sterilization, and transport.
Collaborate with the team to maintain equipment and supplies for surgical procedures and recovery space.
Promote patient safety and quality by adhering to guidelines and regulations.
Collect and enter information into databases as per protocols.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent required. Graduate of an accredited Surgical Technologist program through NBSTSA. Certification exam must be taken and passed within 12 months of completion of the program.
